title: Does any one honor?
body:
Does anyone honor once lvl 30? 
I don't think I've ever used the feature on this account (lvl30+) and mostly just slap the team with reports,
though on my lvl 15 account i want to honor multiple players with relaxed teammates, no intentional trolling, racism, inting, etc
Always interesting to see how the game shapes the player after leveling.
